title: Trump Backs Controversial Immigration Bill (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Backs Controversial Immigration Bill (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- David Bier, an immigration policy analyst at the Cato Institute, and Kevin Appleby, the senior director of international migration policy at the Center for Migration Studies, discuss President Trump's decision to back a controversial new proposal to cut legal immigration into the United States. They speak with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
(Bloomberg) -- David Bier, an immigration policy analyst at the Cato Institute, and Kevin Appleby, the senior director of international migration policy at the Center for Migration Studies, discuss President Trump's decision to back a controversial new proposal to cut legal immigration into the United States. They speak with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
